talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>The path to the mining site ahead is
a dark cave. I hope you brought
<clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The glowing flowers there are
<clr:0000>brightblooms<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>They <clr:0000>shine very brightly<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Many use them
as illumination in dark places.
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>That is excellent. <sp:5:1:0>A light will be necessary
in order to see anything past here.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff> grow primarily in
<clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>There was a time once when they
grew here as well.<sp:0:4:0>But this cave is largely empty of the seeds
by now. <sp:5:0:0>My associates took most of them
due to their pressing needs.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Do not forget to bring some if you intend
to venture inside.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This cave is especially dark.<sp:0:4:0>You will need a light in order to proceed
to the mining site ahead. <sp:5:0:0>Do you have any
<clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>?
talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>It seems you are unaware of
<clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>.
talk_12:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701>Brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff> grow primarily in
caves. <sp:5:0:0>There was a time once when they
grew here as well.<sp:0:4:0>This cave has been mostly picked clean of
them. That is because it is especially dark.
The seeds were often necessary.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>My associates often forget to bring
<clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I am posted here
to provide a reminder.<sp:0:4:0>Use them to light your way if you are
proceeding ahead. <sp:5:0:0>Watch your step.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>These <clr:0000>brightblooms<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0> grow natively in <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>
such as this one.<sp:0:4:0>This cave has been picked mostly clean of
them. That is because it is especially dark.
The seeds were often necessary.<sp:0:4:0>I am posted here to provide a reminder to
bring <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>By the way. <sp:5:0:0>Did you know <clr:0000>brightblooms<clr:ffff>
require a stimulus to blossom?<sp:0:4:0>Striking a <clr:0000>brightbloom seed<clr:ffff> or attaching
it to an arrow will cause it to activate
on <clr:0000>impact<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>brightbloom<clr:ffff> you see growing there<sp:5:0:0>
is no different. I caused it to blossom.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>It will generally be in your best interest to
use <clr:0000>brightbloom seeds <clr:ffff>in dark places
such as this.
talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. They are the seeds of a plant that
grows natively in caves.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>What a relief. <sp:5:0:0>You would not otherwise be
able to see anything as you proceed.
talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Their seeds bloom immediately from the
<clr:0000>impact<clr:ffff> of a sword or arrow.<sp:0:4:0>The flowers <clr:0000>shrine brightly<clr:ffff> after blooming.<sp:5:0:0>
This makes them useful as lights in dark
places such as this.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>I do not have many myself. I would give
them to you otherwise.<sp:0:4:0>My associates have picked the area past
here clean of them. They no longer grow
here. <sp:5:0:0>Do not forget to bring your own.
talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. I mentioned them before. They are
the seeds of a plant that grows natively
in caves.
talk_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Ah. You do not know of them.<sp:5:0:0>
